mainText: Welcome to Transcom Limited. Our, month to date target is : 40.16 Crore. Till now we have made sales near : 29.19 Crore which gives us an 		achievements of 72.68 % . By the way, this month our total target is 5.02 Crore and after analyzing sales behaviour at the end of the month 		our sales will be 72.77 Crore
Yesterday the target amount was : 5.02 Crore. and we made sales of about : 4.35 Crore Therefore our achievements was 86.75% .

For today, our estimated target is : 5.02 Crore. Till now we have made sales of about : 1.62 Crore which covers only 32.32% of our target. 		If our sales goes like this, we may get an achievements of 80.59% which indicates a sale value of 4.05 Crore
